name: Ovidsh (fork)
body:
This is simply a fork of ovisdh by ipoga.

Save the bookmarklet from http://ipoga.github.io/ovidsh to generate a machine-
readable search history from the OvidSP search interface.

Soon, there will be a similar bookmarklet for the Cinahl search interface (I just need to get a functioning URL for the js).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
